name: Refrigerator Toshiba GR-RF532WE-PMJ(06) Morandi Gray
origAbout: Toshiba French Door Refrigerator is built around your daily needs. It converts spaces to maximize your convenience, from a Fridge & Freezer to a Mega Refrigerator and from all sections ON to a only Mini Fridge or a Freezer. Dual Inverter: compressor and fan inverter, speed in response to cooling demand. It uses less energy, minimizes noise and make temperature stably. Plasma+ Pure module produces ions and electrons which can make germs losing biological activity, and adsorption odor and fresh cooling air to keep food fresh longer.
